content:
As an AI language model, I do not have any affiliations or promote any specific software or apps, but here are some inventory management software that may be useful:

1. Zoho Inventory - A cloud-based inventory management software that offers features such as order management, invoicing, and purchase order management.

2. TradeGecko - A centralized inventory management system for businesses that handle wholesale, retail or online sales. 

3. QuickBooks - QuickBooks offers various subscription-based online inventory and accounting software options for small businesses. 

4. Fishbowl - Fishbowl is a desktop-based inventory management software with features such as barcode scanning, order management, and auto-reorder points. 

5. Cin7 - Cin7 is a cloud-based inventory management software that offers features such as advanced reporting and analysis, barcode scanning, and centralized inventory control. 

6. SkuVault - SkuVault is a cloud-based inventory management and warehouse management software with features such as order fulfillment and shipping management. 

When considering any inventory management software or app, it is important to ensure that it has the necessary features to meet your business needs and be easy to use.
